bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of vomiting brought forth by phlegm rheum. HYKY 10: 痰吐者，其兒胃氣 本虛，復感寒邪，生痰作熱，留滯胸膈，故吐 , “In the case of phlegm vom iting , the respective child’s stomach qi is habitually depleted, and was repeatedly affected by cold evil. This has produced phlegm and heat, which has become residually sluggish in the region of the chest and diaphragm. Hence [patients] vomit”.
